channel.title: Err I Forgot, Help Here plz :X
channel.description:
I forgot how u edit the xp you get by training on NPC's.
Could someone tell me how to do it plz?
Thanks ;)

item.title: Err I Forgot, Help Here plz :X
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Yeah, and for future reference, double is a primitive data type it makes it in decimals.

Read full topic
item.source: Err I Forgot, Help Here plz :X

item.title: Err I Forgot, Help Here plz :X
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“VorargC, post:7, topic:172831”][quote author=zammyking111 link=topic=233031.msg1993026#msg1993026 date=1200189961]

TotalExp = (double)(20 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
its saying 20 is double so it would be 400 if im not mistaking.
[/quote]
lol[/quote]

I second that.

zammyking, you wouldn’t know how much XP your getting, because it depends on how much you hit…

Read full topic
item.source: Err I Forgot, Help Here plz :X

item.title: Err I Forgot, Help Here plz :X
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
					{
						TotalExp = (double)(20 * hitDiff);
						TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
						addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);

Search for any part of that code and just change the number, like I would change 20.

Read full topic
